pages.text: The soul combiner is a special device used to infuse items with mob souls. When an $(l:runes/extraction)Soul Extraction Rune$(/l) connected to the same duct network is activated, it will kill the mob and store its soul for later use.$(br)Currently there is only one type of item craft-able in the soul combiner.
Placing a $(l:runes/spawner)Broken Spawner$(/l) in the first slot will craft a new mob spawner. The second slot must have $(l:basics/tear_handling)Tainted Sludge$(/l).
